alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:08PM CDT until August 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHEROKEE...SOUTHWESTERN CLAY AND SOUTHEASTERN O`BRIEN COUNTIES... At 807 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sutherland, or 13 miles north of Cherokee, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 7:53 pm CDT trained spotters south of Paulina reported 8 to 10 inch tree limbs down. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Peterson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
